name: Phoenix.Socket

aliases.name: Socket
aliases.comment: Stores channels, event handlers, and configuration options
aliases.type: { path : String , debug : Bool , channels : Dict.Dict String (Phoenix.Channel.Channel msg) , events : Dict.Dict ( String, String ) (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) , pushes : Dict.Dict Int (Phoenix.Push.Push msg) , ref : Int , heartbeatIntervalSeconds : Float , withoutHeartbeat : Bool }

values.name: init
values.comment: Initializes a `Socket` with the given path

values.name: join
values.comment:
Joins a channel

    payload = Json.Encode.object [ ("user_id", Json.Encode.string "123") ]
    channel = Channel.init "rooms:lobby" |> Channel.withPayload payload
    (socket_, cmd) = join channel socket
values.type: Phoenix.Channel.Channel msg -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> ( Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg , Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Phoenix.Socket.Msg msg) )

values.name: leave
values.comment:
Leaves a channel

    (socket_, cmd) = leave "rooms:lobby" socket
values.type: String -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> ( Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg , Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Phoenix.Socket.Msg msg) )

values.name: listen
values.comment: Listens for phoenix messages and converts them into type `msg`
values.type: Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> (Phoenix.Socket.Msg msg -> msg) -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg

values.name: off
values.comment:
Removes an event handler

    socket
      |> off "new:msg" "rooms:lobby"
      |> off "alert:msg" "rooms:lobby"
values.type: String -> String -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg

values.name: on
values.comment:
Registers an event handler

    socket
      |> on "new:msg" "rooms:lobby" ReceiveChatMessage
      |> on "alert:msg" "rooms:lobby" ReceiveAlertMessage
values.type: String -> String -> (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg

values.name: push
values.comment:
Pushes a message

    push_ = Phoenix.Push.init "new:msg" "rooms:lobby"
    (socket_, cmd) = push push_ socket
values.type: Phoenix.Push.Push msg -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> ( Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg , Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Phoenix.Socket.Msg msg) )

values.name: update
values.type: Phoenix.Socket.Msg msg -> Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg -> ( Phoenix.Socket.Socket msg , Platform.Cmd.Cmd (Phoenix.Socket.Msg msg) )

values.name: withDebug
values.comment: When enabled, prints all incoming Phoenix messages to the console

values.name: withHeartbeatInterval
values.comment:
Sends the heartbeat every interval in seconds

    Default is 30 seconds

values.name: withoutHeartbeat
values.comment: Turns off the heartbeat

name: Phoenix.Push
comment: @docs Push, init, withPayload, onError, onOk, map

aliases.name: Push
aliases.comment: Represents a message being pushed to the server
aliases.type: { event : String , channel : String , payload : Json.Encode.Value , onOk : Maybe.Maybe (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) , onError : Maybe.Maybe (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) }

values.name: init
values.comment:
Initializes a push with the given event and channel

    init "new:msg" "rooms:lobby"

values.name: onError
values.comment:
Attaches an error handler

    init "new:msg" "rooms:lobby"
      |> onError handlePushError

values.name: onOk
values.comment:
Attaches a success handler

    init "new:msg" "rooms:lobby"
      |> onOk handlePushOk

values.name: withPayload
values.comment:
Attaches a payload

    payload = JE.object [ ("body", JE.string "Hello World!") ]
    init "new:msg" "rooms:lobby"
      |> withPayload payload

name: Phoenix.Channel
comment: @docs Channel, State, init, withPayload, onError, onClose, onJoin, onJoinError, setState, map

aliases.name: Channel
aliases.type: { name : String , payload : Json.Encode.Value , state : Phoenix.Channel.State , onClose : Maybe.Maybe (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) , onError : Maybe.Maybe (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) , onJoin : Maybe.Maybe (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) , onJoinError : Maybe.Maybe (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) , joinRef : Int , leaveRef : Int }

types.name: State
types.comment: All possible states a channel can be in

values.name: init
values.comment:
Initializes a channel

    init "rooms:lobby"

values.name: setState
values.comment: Sets the state of a channel. Internal use only.

values.name: withPayload
values.comment:
Attaches a payload that's used for authentication

    payload = JE.object [ ("user_id", JE.string "123") ]
    init "rooms:lobby"
      |> withPayload payload

name: Phoenix.Presence
comment: @docs PresenceState, PresenceStateMetaWrapper, PresenceStateMetaValue, PresenceDiff, syncState, syncDiff, presenceStateDecoder, presenceDiffDecoder, listDefault, list

aliases.name: PresenceDiff
aliases.comment: Represents a diff of presence states
aliases.type: { leaves : Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a , joins : Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a }

aliases.name: PresenceStateMetaValue
aliases.comment: Represents the payload for a given meta value

aliases.name: PresenceStateMetaWrapper
aliases.comment: Represents the metas for a given Presence key

values.name: list
values.comment: Return the metas for a given PresenceState, mapped through a provided mapping function
values.type: (String -> Phoenix.Presence.PresenceStateMetaWrapper a -> Maybe.Maybe b) -> Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a -> List (Maybe.Maybe b)

values.name: listDefault
values.comment: Return the metas for a given PresenceState

values.name: presenceDiffDecoder
values.comment: Decodes a PresenceDiff, parameterized on the type of your application-defined payload

values.name: presenceStateDecoder
values.comment: Decodes a PresenceState, parameterized on the type of your application-defined payload

values.name: syncDiff
values.comment: Synchronize a diff using the existing state
values.type: Phoenix.Presence.PresenceDiff a -> Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a -> Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a

values.name: syncState
values.comment: Synchronize state - this is a really silly function presently, because this client does not provide callbacks as they make little-to-no sense in Elm.
values.type: Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a -> Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a -> Phoenix.Presence.PresenceState a
